settings.editor: I'm creative designer based in Uganda, and I'm very passionate and dedicated to my work.

settings.description_text: I specialize in graphic design that communicates your brand's story through compelling visuals.
I am dedicated to crafting visually appealing and functional websites that effectively represent your brand.
I focus on creating intuitive and engaging user experiences through thoughtful UI/UX design.

settings.title: I Can Design Anything You Want

settings.editor:
Hi! I'm Jaques Bavurhe, a web and graphic designer dedicated to creating visually stunning and user-friendly digital experiences. With a strong eye for detail and a passion for innovation, I bring ideas to life through effective design solutions.

In addition to design, I have skills in networking, allowing me to understand the technical aspects that support my work. Explore my portfolio to see my projects, and feel free to reach out!

I’m excited to share a selection of my recent projects that highlight my passion for web and graphic design. Each piece represents a unique collaboration and reflects my commitment to delivering high-quality, visually appealing solutions. Explore my work to see how I bring ideas to life and help brands stand out in a crowded digital landscape.

settings.title: I Develop Skills Regularly to Keep Me Updated

settings.editor: Here’s a snapshot of my core skills that drive my design work. Each area reflects my commitment to continuous learning and my passion for creating effective, engaging solutions. Explore my expertise in web design, graphic design, and networking to see how I can help bring your projects to life.

I offer innovative web and graphic design solutions tailored to elevate your brand. Whether you're looking for a stunning website, captivating graphics, or a cohesive brand identity, my goal is to create designs that not only look great but also resonate with your audience. Let’s collaborate to bring your vision to life!

I specialize in graphic design that communicates your brand's story through compelling visuals. From logo design to marketing materials, I create striking graphics that capture attention and resonate with your audience.

I am dedicated to crafting visually appealing and functional websites that effectively represent your brand. By utilizing the latest design trends and technologies, I create responsive layouts that provide a seamless experience across all devices.

I focus on creating intuitive and engaging user experiences through thoughtful UI/UX design. By combining user research, wireframing, and prototyping, I ensure that every interaction is seamless and enjoyable.
I specialize in configuring Cisco devices to optimize network performance and security. With a solid understanding of networking protocols and infrastructure, I ensure seamless connectivity.
Thank you everyone for supporting me to this point.

settings.testimonial_content: Working with you has been a dream! Your web and graphic design skills are top-notch—innovative, stunning, and always perfectly tailored. You turn every project into a masterpiece. Proud of your work!

Your web and graphic design skills are remarkable! I've seen your dedication and talent transform ideas into stunning visuals. Your work is both innovative and professional. Truly proud of your achievements!

settings.title: I Want To Hear From You

settings.editor: Please fill out the form on this section to contact with me. Or call 24/7, Monday through Sunday
© 2024. Copyright Jaques Bavurhe All Rights Reserved

settings.html:
<style>
    html,body{
        overflow-x: hidden;
    }
    .logo-object{
            animation: logo-object 4s linear infinite;
        }
        @keyframes logo-object{
            0%{
                transform: translateY(-7px);
            }
            50%{
                transform: translateY(7px);
            }
            100%{
                transform: translateY(-7px);
            }
        }
        
        
    
    .header{
        right: 0;
        left: 0;
    }
    
    
    
    .top-image-box .elementor-image-box-img{
        width: 90px !important;
    }
    
    
    .image-gallery .eael-gallery-grid-item img{
        min-height: 260px;
    }
    .image-gallery .eael-filter-gallery-control ul {
        margin: 0px 0px 50px 0px;
    }
    
    
    .testmonial .elementor-testimonial-content{
        position: relative;
        padding-top: 70px;
        margin-bottom: 35px;
    }
    .testmonial .elementor-testimonial-content:before{
        content: "";
        height: 40px;
        width: 65px;
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translate(-50%);
        background-image: url('https://tutorialic.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/quat.png');
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-size: auto 100%;
    }
    .progress-bar .eael-progressbar-line, .progress-bar .eael-progressbar-line-fill{
        border-radius: 50px;
    }
    .contact-info .elementor-icon-box-icon{
        height: 88px;
        width: 88px;
        background: #fedfd7;
        border-radius: 50%;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
    }
    .contact-info.email .elementor-icon-box-icon{
        background: #ddf5e6;
    }
    .contact-info.phone .elementor-icon-box-icon{
        background: #ece8fd
    }
    .contact-info .elementor-icon-box-title{
        margin-bottom: 10px;
        margin-top: 5px;
    }
    .counter .elementor-counter{
        display: flex;
    }
    .counter .elementor-counter-title{
        text-align: left;
        margin-left: 20px;
        margin-top: 8px;
    }
    
    
    .services .red-color{
        color: #F75023;
    }
    .services .elementor-image-box-title{
        margin-top: 5px;
    }
    .to-top{
        position: relative;
    }
    .to-top:before{
        content: "";
        height: 1px;
        width: 60px;
        background: #000;
        position: absolute;
        top: 80px;
        right: -9px;
        transform: rotate(90deg);
    }
    
    
    @media (max-width: 1600px) {
        .counter .elementor-counter-title{
            margin-top: 3px;
        }
    }
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
        .image-gallery .eael-filter-gallery-control ul {
        margin: 0px 0px 35px 0px;
    }
    .contact-info .elementor-icon-box-icon{
        height: 60px;
        width: 60px;
        padding-top: 0px;
    }
}
    @media (max-width: 767px) {
        .testmonial .elementor-testimonial-content:before{
        height: 25px;
        width: 40px;
    }
     .testmonial .elementor-testimonial-content{
        position: relative;
        padding-top: 45px;
    }
    .contact-info .elementor-icon-box-icon{
        padding-top: 17px;
    }
    .services .elementor-image-box-img{
        width: 90px !important;
    }
}
        
    
</style>
